sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'], }) export class ContactComponent { contact = { name: '', email: '', message: '', }; onSubmit() { // Here you can add logic to handle the form submission console.log('Form submitted:', this.contact); // Add further logic for sending data, e.g., an HTTP request } }
